sheep.game
Class Camera

java.lang.Object
  sheep.game.Camera

public class Camera
extends java.lang.Object

Can be attached to a World object and translate the entire scene according its position.

          A camera at (-MAX, -MAX) with dimensions (MAX, MAX).

Constructor Detail

Camera

public Camera(float width,
              float height)
Creates a new Camera at (0, 0) with the specified size. The size of the camera is used to exclude sprites which are outside the camera bounding box from being drawn on screen.

Parameters:
width - The width of the Camera.
height - The height of the Camera.

              Vector2 size)
Creates a new Camera at the specified position with the specified size.

position -

Moves the Camera by (dx, dy).
